Package com.percussion.services.assembly

Interface Summary
IPSAssembler Assembles the given items into results for preview or publishing.
IPSAssemblyErrors Error numbers for use with the bundle PSAssemblyErrorStringBundle
IPSAssemblyItem Each unit of work to be assembled is represented by an assembly item.
IPSAssemblyResult Each assembler creates an assembly result, one or more per content item being assembled.
IPSAssemblyService The assembler service acts as a toplevel assembler that dispatches to component assemblers on the basis of the passed template, and additionally supplies the methods to manipulate templates and slots.
IPSAssemblyTemplate A template combines a reference to a specific assembler, with information to be used in doing the assembly.
IPSSlotContentFinder Slot finders calculate what items are related to a particular content item.
IPSTemplateBinding A binding describes the pairing of a variable to bind with an expression to evaluate.
IPSTemplateService Manage templates and slots, allowing the creation, reading, updating and deleting of template and slot instances.
IPSTemplateSlot A template may have one or more slots.
 

Class Summary
PSAssemblyServiceLocator Locator to get the assembly service
 

Enum Summary
IPSAssemblyResult.Status The status values indicate whether this assembly was a failure or success.
IPSAssemblyTemplate.AAType Information about active assembly type, which is used when determining how to display active assembly controls in that mode.
IPSAssemblyTemplate.GlobalTemplateUsage Defines values that dictate how the given template uses a global template.
IPSAssemblyTemplate.OutputFormat Output format indicates if this is a page, snippet or binary template
IPSAssemblyTemplate.PublishWhen Information used to determine when to publish this template for site folder publishing.
IPSAssemblyTemplate.TemplateType Template type indicates if this template is meant to be used with a single content type or across content types.
IPSSlotContentFinder.Type The type of the slot content finder.
IPSTemplateSlot.SlotType Slot type defines the usage of the slot
 

Exception Summary
PSAssemblyException Generic problem in assembly, the message will indicate what issue occurred.
PSTemplateNotImplementedException Thrown if the configured assembly plugin can't handle the passed template
